name: Ratz Race 2073 1.1
description:
Ratz Race is a cyberpunk action race game inspired by the classic Snow Crash from Neal Stephenson! 

In game, the driver have to deliver a pizza in time, in this world, pizzas and engineering bacame the most important industry. The player has now 2 minutes not to have his life ruined by not delivering in time!

The future ideas for the game includes hacknslash fightings with robots.
